tasks.label: Run Coverage
tasks.command: if [ -d build ]; then cd build && find ../src -name '*.gcno' -exec gcov {} \; && ./tests/ProjectTests && lcov --capture --directory . --output-file coverage.info --rc lcov_branch_coverage=1 --exclude '*usr/include*' --exclude '*external*' && genhtml coverage.info --output-directory out --branch-coverage; else echo 'Build directory does not exist'; fi
